div.p: py3o.fusion is a webservice that renders py3o.template files into plain LibreOffice files. It can also render directly to PDF or any other format supported by LibreOffice: DOC, DOCX ...
py3o.fusion exposes an API endpoint on /form. If you issue a GET on this page you'll get some information on what is expected of the form.

What is not described in this form though is the fact that the images are not limited. You can post as many image files as you want, as long as you correctly refer to them in the image_mapping field. We'll get to that soon.
